title: Suche TryhardDuo Mate für S6 High Dia Goalsetting  Plat3+ , bin Main ADC Ts³ Req
body:
**Erstmal hallo Leute , ich wollte diesen ganzen Kram nicht nochmal auf Deutsch übersetzen aber wer kein Englisch kann , diesen Post ignorieren, danke :D
**
Hello Guys to me, im oleg 24 years old , i play lol already since S1 , S1 Gold, S2 Plat, S3 Dia, S4 Not played , S5 Plat because i came 2 late into the season 
to Reach Dia again from silver 2 :P .
My Roles are  Adc > Jungle > Mid > Support> Top , exactly in this Order 

But i will always Prefer to go for my ADC

My most played Champs are 
{{champion:104}} {{champion:67}}  {{champion:81}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:51}} 
{{champion:76}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:121}} 
{{champion:127}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:25}} 
{{champion:41}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:122}} 

I Can play everyone of them on a High Skill Cap , The Order has **NO** Meanining to me it's just a list

I have my own TS³ Server.

What do i expect from you ? 

18+ 
Can play any Role (Supports Pref.)
Doesnt give up if the Game is Winnable 
Speaks Fluently English, German or Russian
have a working Mic that doesnt make u sound like a frkin Robot
Is Active like 4-5 Days a Week
Can play at LEAST 4 Games a Day , Recommend more .
Knows how to fuck shit up :D

If you're Interested or may have any questions dont be bothered to ask me here or add me , IGN : Not my Ex Again

Ty for Reading.

Best Regards, probably not your Ex 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
